body.para: Bad array declarator: To declare a managed array the rank specifier precedes the variable's identifier. To declare a fixed size buffer field, use the fixed keyword before the field type.

An array was declared incorrectly. In X#, unlike in C and C++, the square brackets follow the type, not the variable name. Also, realize that the syntax for a fixed size buffer differs from that of an array.
